{"id":394838614,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2 years, 11 months","timestamp":1599958840,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"20 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/394838614/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Edit Distance","memory":"8.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int minDistance(string word1, string word2) {\n        if (word1.size() == 0 || word2.size() == 0) {\n            return word1.size() + word2.size();\n        }\n        vector<vector<int>> DP(word1.size() + 1, vector<int>(word2.size() + 1, 0));\n        for (int i = 0; i <= word1.size(); ++i) {\n            DP[i][0] = i;\n        }\n        \n        for (int j = 0; j <= word2.size(); ++j) {\n            DP[0][j] = j;\n        }\n        \n        for (int i = 1; i <= word1.size(); ++i) {\n            for (int j = 1; j <= word2.size(); ++j) {\n                if (word1[i-1] == word2[j-1]) {\n                    DP[i][j] = min(min(DP[i][j-1] + 1, DP[i-1][j] + 1), DP[i-1][j-1]);\n                } else {\n                    DP[i][j] = min(min(DP[i][j-1] + 1, DP[i-1][j] + 1), DP[i-1][j-1] + 1);\n                }\n                \n            }\n        }\n        return DP.back().back();\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"edit-distance","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
